text:
Tomcat 7.0.14 at localhost.

I have a strange problem when accessing servlet on Tomcat 7.0.14 server with Safari and Google Chrome browsers. There is no cookies. No JSESSIONID, nothing in Javascript: document.cookie variable. But i see that cookie JSESSIONID is registered in "Show cookies" Safari preferences area.
When i access Tomcat 6.0.30 with all this browsers all things work as expected.
creator: belykh.o@gmail.com

text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. This question belongs on the Tomcat user's mailing list.
creator: markt@apache.org
